title: Continuous Lactate Monitors are Poised to Reshape Pro Cycling: ‘The Most Important Revolution since Heart Rate Monitors’
content:
Real-time lactate-measuring devices could change the game of endurance training – and they're on the way to the pro peloton.

Read the full article at Continuous Lactate Monitors are Poised to Reshape Pro Cycling: ‘The Most Important Revolution since Heart Rate Monitors’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
